trans-unit.resname: HML·15 | Serra Bestiary | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature\nAt the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice CARDNAME unless you pay {W}{W}.\nEnchanted creature can't attack or block, and its activated abilities with {T} in their costs can't be activated.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持阶段，支付oWoW，否则埋葬CARDNAME。受此结界的生物不能攻击、阻挡，或使用启动费用中含有ocT的任何异能。

trans-unit.note: 非官方翻译于legacy card name（2024-02-28）

trans-unit.resname: HML·17 | Serra Paladin | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.
trans-unit.target: ocT：为任何生物或玩家防止1点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: HML·17 | Serra Paladin | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {1}{W}{W}, {T}: Target creature gains vigilance until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: o1oWoW，ocT：目标生物此回合攻击时不须横置。

trans-unit.source: Each player may draw up to two cards. For each card less than two a player draws this way, that player gains 2 life.
trans-unit.target: 每名玩家可以最多抓两张牌。未抓满两张牌的玩家，每少抓一张可获得2点生命。

trans-unit.resname: HML·21 | Aether Storm | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.target: 召唤咒语皆不能被使用。

trans-unit.resname: HML·21 | Aether Storm | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Pay 4 life: Destroy CARDNAME. It can't be regenerated. Any player may activate this ability.
trans-unit.target: 任何玩家可支付4点生命以埋葬CARDNAME。

trans-unit.resname: HML·25a | Dark Maze | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Defender (This creature can't attack.)\n{0}: CARDNAME can attack this turn as though it didn't have defender. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.
trans-unit.target: o0：CARDNAME在此回合中，可以像不是墙一般地攻击。在回合结束时，将CARDNAME移出游戏。

trans-unit.source: Target player discards two cards, then draws as many cards as they discarded this way.
trans-unit.target: 目标牌手从手牌中选择并弃掉两张牌，然后抓与他因此法被弃掉的牌相等数量的牌。

trans-unit.note: 非官方翻译于legacy card name（2024-02-28）

trans-unit.resname: HML·28 | Giant Oyster | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: You may choose not to untap CARDNAME during your untap step.
trans-unit.target: 你可以选择于你的重置步骤中不重置CARDNAME。

trans-unit.resname: HML·28 | Giant Oyster | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {T}: For as long as CARDNAME remains tapped, target tapped creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step, and at the beginning of each of your draw steps, put a -1/-1 counter on that creature. When CARDNAME leaves the battlefield or becomes untapped, remove all -1/-1 counters from the creature.
trans-unit.target: {T}：只要CARDNAME持续被横置，目标已横置的生物于其操控者的重置步骤中便不能重置，且在你的每个抓牌步骤开始时，在该生物上放置一个-1/-1指示物。 当CARDNAME离场或成为未横置时，移去该生物上所有的-1/-1指示物。

trans-unit.note: 非官方翻译于legacy card name（2024-02-28）；卡牌效果似乎和倒霉没有关系

trans-unit.resname: HML·30a | Labyrinth Minotaur | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME blocks a creature, that creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
trans-unit.target: 若CARDNAME阻挡任何生物，该生物在其操控者的下一次重置阶段中不可重置。

trans-unit.note: 非官方翻译于legacy card name（2024-02-28）；这种译法出现过不少次了，我不确定早期是不是有这样的译法

trans-unit.resname: HML·32a | Memory Lapse | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, put it on top of its owner's library instead of into that player's graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 反击目标咒语。如果以此法反击该咒语，则改为将它置于其拥有者的牌库顶，而非置入该牌手的坟墓场。

trans-unit.resname: HML·33 | Merchant Scroll | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Search your library for a blue instant card, reveal that card, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: 从你的牌库中搜寻一张蓝色瞬间牌，展示该牌，并置于你手上。然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.note: 非官方翻译于legacy card name（2024-02-28）
非官方翻译于legacy card name（2024-02-28）

trans-unit.resname: HML·36a | Reef Pirates | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME deals damage to an opponent, that player mills a card.
trans-unit.target: 若CARDNAME伤害任何对手，则将该玩家牌库之顶牌放置于他的坟墓场中。
